mapper.select: select comid, comcategorynum, comtitle, comcontent, compageview, comuserid, comcreatedate, comisdelete from community where comisdelete = 'N' and comid = #{comid}
mapper.insert: insert into community(comtitle, comcategorynum, comcontent, comuserid, comcreatedate) values(#{comtitle}, #{comcategorynum}, #{comcontent}, #{comuserid}, #{comcreatedate})
mapper.delete: update community set comisdelete='Y' where comid = #{comid}
